formatted_address: 5 Changi Business Park Central 1, #01-24 Changi City Point, Singapore 486038
name: MiX Store @ Changi City Point Mall

reviews.text:
Mix Store at Changi City Point is a delightful spot for exploring unique and trendy items. With a diverse collection of products, including China, Taiwan, Japan, and Korea goods, it caters to shoppers looking for special finds. From snacks to lifestyle items, the store is well-stocked and organized, offering an enjoyable browsing experience.

The addition of a self-service kiosk makes checkout convenient and efficient. A perfect place to discover fascinating and culturally rich merchandise while enjoying a relaxed shopping vibe. Ideal for those seeking both practicality and novelty in their shopping trips!

Interesting concept. Lots of good find n buys. Wide price range fr $1+ to $5 to cater to d pocket money teens n young adults. As this is my 1st visit, I m not sure if d items r changed periodically. I m keen to come back again to find out. Ice lolly $4.90 each.

I had just landed at Changi Airport, feeling hungry and craving a snack. So, I decided to take a walk around Changi City Point Mall, and that’s when I came across this trendy global snack store. The store’s vibrant interior design immediately caught my eye, with shelves packed full of snacks in various colorful packaging from all around the world.

Curious, I stepped inside to see what they had, and the thing that stood out to me the most was a large bag of Sweet Potato Chips. It was affordable, and when I tried it, the taste was sweet, crispy, and not overly greasy—just perfect! After picking up a few more snacks and a drink, I headed to the self-checkout counter. It was user-friendly and straightforward, making the whole shopping experience seamless.

Overall, the store has a wide variety of trendy snacks from different countries. If you're a snack lover or just want to try something new, I highly recommend checking this place out!
this outlet male  staff is very friendly!

vicinity: 5 Changi Business Park Central 1, #01-24 Changi City Point, Singapore
